claim: oldsmobile have the most start over any other engine
resp:

1. Identify the engine column in the table, which shows the type of engine used for each race entry. The relevant engines are unique across rows (Oldsmobile, Ford Cosworth DFX, Judd, Chevrolet, Mercedes - Benz IC108B).

3. Repeat step 2 for all other engines and compare the counts to see if any engine has more starts than Oldsmobile. For Ford Cosworth DFX: 6 instances (1985, 1986, 1988, 1989, 1992, 1993); Judd: 2 instances (1989, 1990); Chevrolet: 2 instances (1992, 2002); Mercedes - Benz IC108B: 1 instance (1995).
4. Compare the counts from steps 2 and 3 to determine which engine has the most starts. The count for Oldsmobile is higher than any other engine.

- Year 1993 has 2 races (Row 7 and Row 9).

Since there are more races with a start year of 1992 than 1993, the claim is TRUE.
